control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements [Assignment: organization-defined cryptographic uses and type of cryptography required for each use] in accordance with applicable federal laws, Executive Orders, directives, policies, regulations, and standards.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs automated tools to support near real-time analysis of events.
